text:
Vitagene.com | Frontend and Backend Engineers | San Francisco | Onsite | Full time

Vitagene is a “rocket ship” startup in the DNA and wellness industry. Come join the ride and help us make a lot of people healthier.

Stack: Python (Django), PostgreSQL, Celery, Angular, AWS.

Apply: jobs@vitagene.com or https://vitagene.com/company/careers/
